input.sentences: up here in mountain country | flowers seem to grow even more beautifully than anywhere else .
i 'm not big on knowing the names of all of them | but i sure do like these yellow guys .
this little white sweeties grow wild all over the place .
these blue fellows great me every morning .
i think this is a rose . it could be something else | but i love it all the same !
output.sentences: The fresh mountain air allowed many things to thrive .
Many yellow flowers blossomed in the sunlight.
There where white flowers , so pale they almost blended in with the snow.
The blue flowers were breath taking , like pretty fairies dancing in the breeze.
Red flowers so brillent they seemed to make the brightest fire seem dim .
